name: Stick Together (Amigo121)
description:
2D platform game, you start as plain toast and make your way up to jelly-peanutbutter sandwich.

Game assets created by me using Pixilart.com

Used game audio: none

No game audio and crap game in general due to lack of time (SORRY!)

Made in: GameMaker Studio 2

Made for: GMTK Game Jam 2021 (theme: "joined together")

Controls: 

  • Move in menu - arrow keys
  • Select - ENTER
  • In-game  
  • Character turn left/right - left/right arrow key 
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Super Jump - LShift + SPACE

- other specified in-game
